General.Name: Pineapple Financial Inc.
General.Description: Pineapple Financial Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides mortgage brokerage services and technology solutions to mortgage agents, brokers, sub-brokers, and brokerages and consumers in Canada. The company offers mortgage consultation services; advise clients on the various mortgage products offered by financial institutions, as well as offers clients access to rate information and mortgage options from lenders, including banks and lending institutions; and assist clients in selecting mortgage solution. It also operates MyPineapple, a technology platform that allows users to conduct their brokerage services. In addition, the company offers back office support services, such as digital and automated onboarding and set up, loan packaging and processing, digital document collection and client portals, loan maintenance activities, payroll, lender communication, reporting requirements for regulators and business management, cloud services, expense collections, document preparation, compliance, training, administration, and marketing. Further, it provides pre-underwriting support services comprising credit review, data validation, fraud analysis and compliance, appraisal ordering and review, and data analytics. Additionally, the company offers various insurance products, including whole life, permanent life, critical illness, and credit insurance. The company was formerly known as 2487269 Ontario Ltd and changed its name to Pineapple Financial Inc. in June 2021. Pineapple Financial Inc. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in North York, Canada.
General.Address: 111 Gordon Baker Road, North York, ON, Canada, M2H 3R1
